name: Yummy Taco Salad Dip
author: JWEARY15
summary: This is always a hit at any party! My friends and family beg me to make it every time!  Use tortilla chips to scoop up the flavorful layers.  The dip may be served immediately, but tastes best when chilled 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
directions: In a 12x12 inch or larger dish, evenly spread the refried beans in a thin layer
In a medium bowl, mix the avocado and lemon juice until almost smooth
A few avocado lumps are desirable
Spread the avocado mixture over the refried beans
In a medium bowl, blend the sour cream and  ; spread over the avocado mixture
Sprinkle the tomatoes in a layer over the sour cream mixture, followed by the olives and the green onions
Top the dip with a layer of cheese
